name: The Big Umbrella- "A ReaL MeaL Donation"
description:
Your Donation will provide "A ReaL MeaL" for homeless street kids in Kathmandu.  These displaced Children , & Teens, would other wise beg for money to eat.
A mere $20.00 Donation, will feed 18 kids 1 plate of Dal Bhat, (Rice, Veg and Chicken Curry).
"A ReaL MeaL" takes place each & every Sunday in Thamel, Kathmandu. 
Please drop in and share this amazing experience with some truly wonderful Kidz, if you are in the area. 

Thank you for making such a difference to a childs life.

name: The Big Umbrella - "Study 4 Change Donation"
description:
Study 4 Change is a program working with the street kids of Kathmandu.  The Big Umbrella wishes to bring much more needed love, understanding & valuable education into the lives of the Street Kids for a better future.

By providing schools books to read, maps to study, and pens & pencils to color and draw with, The Big Umbrella hopes to inspire & create interest in learning, something the Kids have already shown us. 

We now need to put more books & ideas in their hands & minds.

With the assistance of Western Volunteers, talking to, sharing with, or just being a big brother or sister for a day. The simple act of sitting, coloring/drawing with the kidz is more than appreciated.  They are very responsive, & learn something special from each interaction.

At the end of the 2 hour study period, the volunteers then take them for a well needed & deserved meal.

Food for thought & food to thrive.

name: The Big Umbrella- "MakE A ReaL DifferencE Donation"
description:
100% of your  Donation will go to the Charity or NGO of your Choice under our Big Umbrella.

Choose from: 

*The Fight Against Human Trafficking in Nepal and Peru.
*The umbrella foundation- Nepal
*The Not for Sale campaign - Peru

Building schools in Champawat, India
*Network of Love

*Debotche water project for the Tibetan Buddhist Nuns
Mt Everest Foundation- Nepal

*Building a Save house for Woman in Lima- Peru

*Building Greenhouses for the Age in Leh, India

or any of the fine Charities / NGO's the Big Umbrella have personally visited and received the tick of approval from Us.

name: Giving BacK a LifE DonatioN
description: 100% of your Donation will go directly to Helping a child that is living on the streets to living a normal life in a home. The money will be used to rehabilitate them, for professional canceling, a small bag of new clothes, sending them to a vocational training center, where they will work and live for 6 months, after which time they will be assigned a job placement within their chosen trade.
